sentences.en: Having no body, form, or substance ; incorporeal.
sentences.cn: 缺少物质的身体 、 形式或者实质.

sentences.en: Only a Necromancer's army has incorporeal creatures who can avoid damage in melee combat.
sentences.cn: 只有亡灵的部队拥有可以躲避肉搏伤害的虚无单位.

sentences.en: Plato demonstrated the incorporeal nature of the soul.
sentences.cn: 柏拉图阐明灵魂是无形的。

sentences.en: The real life is guided by our incorporeal intellection.
sentences.cn: 我想，这表示我们无形的思想导引着真实的人生。

sentences.en: They seemed to have the power to touch the incorporeal and see the invisible.
sentences.cn: 他们似乎有一种力量能触摸到无形的和看到不可见的东西.

sentences.en: Trade secrets are incorporeal property, which keep non - visible by means of maintaining secrecy.
sentences.cn: 商业秘密是通过保密的方式予以保持的无形财产.

words.tran_cn: 灵魂的；无实体的；非物质的

trans.tran_cn: 无实体的，无形的，非物质的，无影无形
trans.tran_en: not existing in any physical form
